text: The pizza looks great.  The driver, Albert, was timely and friendly.  Ordering online was easy.  Although the pizza taste fresh, it doesn't taste as good as it did years ago.  Mine could have had a little more cheese . But overall, good pizza.

text: Always friendly staff. Night shift manager is great. He knows me by name when I walk in. And has my order ready when I pull into the parking lot. Tuesday night kids buffets are great too. They keep the buffet stocked well with fresh pizzas and the salad is always fresh.
